items.title: Call to Action!  Stand with Sanctuary4All Colorado by calling on...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Call to Action!
Stand with Sanctuary4All Colorado by calling on Senator Hickenlooper to support immigrant communities!

This week, Senator Hickenlooper turned his back on the immigrant community in Colorado and around the country by supporting a move to block undocumented families from receiving COVID relief checks. While the vote was non-binding, he needs to hear from constituents that these decisions that hurt those most vulnerable to the pandemic will not be tolerated, bef...ore he does it again.

Sanctuary 4 All, a grassroots organization that advocates for the immigrant community in Colorado, has put out a call to action for Coloradans to voice their anger over Hickenlooper’s vote.

WHY: Coloradans elected Senator Hickenlooper to support everyone, regardless of their legal status. He needs to know that this is an unacceptable position to take and that we will hold him accountable.

HOW: Call Senator Hickenlooper today at 202-224-5941 to let him know that everyone deserves relief from the COVID-19 pandemic and that his actions matter to the people of Colorado.

SAMPLE SCRIPT:
My name is [FULL NAME] and I live in [COMMUNITY/ZIP CODE].
I am calling because I am deeply disturbed by Senator Hickenlooper’s vote to block undocumented families from receiving COVID relief checks. Everyone in Colorado and around the country deserves support during this pandemic, especially immigrant communities that can be even more vulnerable. As his constituent, I will continue to hold Hickenlooper accountable for all of his votes and demand that he support immigrant families.

GOAL: DSURJ’s goal is to generate at least 20 calls by the end of the weekend to send a clear message to Hickenlooper that we are watching each and every one of his votes.

Comment below to let us know you've reached out and please share!

See More

items.title: Emergency call Today Senator Hickenlooper has started a bad...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency call Today Senator Hickenlooper has started a bad journey in his role by giving his back to the immigrant community. By voting no on COVID relief checks for immigrant families that have no sort of economic support from our government. Clearly he does not care now that he has a home, he has food, he has medical insurance, a secure salary that his citizens pay including tax paying immigrants. His decisions harm a large number of people in Colorado and that is unaccept...able. Call his office in Washington and let him know that his decision was one of the biggest mistakes he could’ve made. 202-224-5941. We hope that he supports all his citizens in Colorado but also at a national level regardless of their legal status. The immigrant community in this pandemic is the most vulnerable in not being able to receive federal aid. Call and ask your acquaintances to show their indignation and anger upon this decision.

See More

items.title: Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her application for residency. She’s been living in the U.S. since she was a child and now has three children of her own, and obtaining her residency is crucial for her to be able to stay with her family, including her parents, siblings, and children. You can order enchiladas to support Tania and her family at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals program. She arrived to the U.S. when she was just five years old, and through DACA she’s ...been able to pursue higher education, work for Denver Public Schools as a family liaison, and have a family of her own. She’s now applying for her residency, which is an incredibly expensive process, so she’s selling enchiladas this weekend to help raise money to cover the costs. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup will be in Denver this weekend, and money can be sent via Venmo to @/tania-baez-30. Place in Denver for pick up 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 ready 1 pm

items.title: *Sigue en español* ACTION ALERT - We share with you in anger...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

*Sigue en español*
ACTION ALERT - We share with you in anger and sadness the unjust news that Not1More member Hilda Martinez was arrested at a Border Patrol checkpoint on Friday and is being held in jail in New Mexico right now. Hilda Martinez requests your immediate solidarity. She was visiting family in El Paso last week. These checkpoints are a part of the daily terror and oppression Border Patrol inflicts on the region. She will have her first hearing this week. Her child...ren are safe here in Colorado as they did not accompany her on this visit.
Action steps:
1. Leave a love note or prayer here for Hilda. We'll be sharing them with her when she calls.
2. Attend our livestream vigil tonight. https://fb.me/e/42WwzHSmJ Next steps will be shared and we'll hear from her or her sister.
3. Contribute to this gofundme and share in solidarity to support her legal costs and her children. gf.me/u/zhqkph
4. Sign and share her petition https://www.change.org/p/united-state-attorney-free-hilda-b…
#FreeHilda #KeepFamiliesTogether
*********************************************
ALERTA de ACCION – Compartimos con rabia, tristeza y firmeza que una líder de Ni1Mas, Hilda Martinez, fue arrestada el viernes por parte de la Patrulla Fronteriza en un punto de reten y esta encarcelada en Nueva México en este momento. Hilda se solicita su solidaridad inmediata. . Ella estuvo visitando con familia en el área de El Paso, TX la semana pasada. Estos retenes son parte del terror y represión que se impone la Patrulla Fronteriza en las comunidades fronterizas. Tendrá su primera audiencia esta semana. Sus hijos están aquí al salvo en Colorado como no fueron con ella de paseo.
Paso de acción:
1. Deja una oración o nota de amor por Hilda Aquí. Vamos a estar compartiendo estos con ella.
2. Asiste a la vigilia virtual de esta noche https://fb.me/e/42WwzHSmJ
3. Contribuye a su gofundme por gastos legales y para el sosten de sus hijos gf.me/u/zhqkph
4 Firme y comparte su peticion. https://www.change.org/p/united-state-attorney-free-hilda-b…
Sanctuary4All Colorado Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition - CIRC Colorado People's Alliance

See More

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.

forbes.com

Regions Bank Of Alabama Turns Its Back On CoreCivic, Announces Plan To End Relationship

Today, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.Today, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.

items.title: Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals program. She arrived to the U.S. when she was just five years old, and through DACA she’s been able to pursue higher education, work for Denver Public Schools as a family liaison, and have a family of her own. She’s now applying for her residency, which is an incredibly expensive process, so she’s selling enchiladas this weekend to help raise money to cover the costs. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup will be in Denver this weekend, and money can be sent via Venmo to @/tania-baez-30. Place in Denver for pick up 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 ready 1 pm

items.title: Jeanette Vizguerra
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra

The Biden administration has voiced intent to make comprehensive changes to immigration policies, including through a legislative proposal that would include a pathway to citizenship.

“We can come out of this shadow”: Colorado immigrants look to Biden’s proposed policies for certainty
